messages.content: You may have heard that record numbers of NHS Trusts are in crisis. School budgets are being slashed. An extreme Brexit is risking jobs across Derby. Is this the direction you want for our country? I know it’s not what I want. That’s why I’ve been campaigning alongside my Liberal Democrat colleagues for a brighter future for Britain and for Derby.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: £6 billion extra per year for the NHS and social care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Paid for by an extra penny on income tax, as part of long term planning.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Full reversal of the Tory benefit cuts
Extra £7 billion for our schools and colleges
A referendum on the result of Brexit negotiations
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Allowing you, not politicians in Brussels and Westminster, to have the final say on the Brexit deal.
By making all homes energy efficient, and producing more renewable energy to reduce the UK’s carbon footprint.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A real alternative to the Tory government’s impractical dreams and a blank cheque on Brexit

issues.brexitEurope: A referendum on the result of Brexit negotiations, allowing you, not politicians in Brussels and Westminster, to have the final say on the Brexit deal.
issues.education: Extra £7 billion for our schools and colleges, backing the next generation.
issues.environment: Saving you money by making all homes energy efficient, and producing more renewable energy to reduce the UK’s carbon footprint.
issues.health: £6 billion extra per year for the NHS and social care, paid for by an extra penny on income tax, as part of long term planning.
issues.labourEmployment: Full reversal of the Tory benefit cuts--which Labour have refused to match.
issues.socialWelfare: £6 billion extra per year for the NHS and social care, paid for by an extra penny on income tax, as part of long term planning.
